name: adjunct_make_script_and_rst.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: Program to take a script with some special markup and turn it into both an RST page and a script for the online Sphinx documentation.

inputs.description: Input script file with special markup
inputs.name: Input script

inputs.description: Output filename including any path of the RST/Sphinx file. Must include file extension '.rst'.
inputs.name: RST file prefix

inputs.description: Output filename of the script file. Should include file extension such as '.tcsh'.
inputs.name: Script file prefix

inputs.description: A string tag that will serve as the subdirectory name holding images for the given demo, and the RST internal reference label.
inputs.name: Reference link

inputs.description: Flag to create the RST and script files, and also execute the script.
inputs.name: Execute script flag
